Using his [[chakra]], [[Gaara]] gathers the densest minerals in the soil, compresses their size, and then mixes them together. The resulting [[sand]] is formed into a protective shield in front of Gaara, shaped to resemble a miniature [[Shukaku]], the {{translation|"Incarnation of Sand"|砂の化身|Suna no Keshin}}. The Shukaku shield, because of how meticulously it's constructed, is incredibly strong, to the point that not even the [[Dance of the Clematis: Flower]] can penetrate it.<ref name="d2"/>

== Trivia ==
* In the anime, the Shield of Shukaku has an offensive counterpart: [[Ultimately Hard Absolute Attack: Spear of Shukaku]].
* In the anime, the sand for this technique has a sparkling golden colour, resembling [[Gold Dust]].
